26.ara-name: كتاب الأشربة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ubaidullah bin 'Abdullah narrated a report (of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) from Abu Sa'eed, that he prohibited bending the mouths of the water-skins. He said:There are narrations on this topic from Jabir, Ibn 'Abbas, and Abu Hurairah. [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan Sahih

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي النَّهْىِ عَنِ اخْتِنَاثِ الأَسْقِيَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Prohibition Of Beding The Mouths Of Water-Skins
